channel.title: Help me identify the music
channel.description:
K guys so I like the [b]chorus[/b] to this song. the screamo bothers me.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CpzoUbTXn1k
chorus starts at :40
It sounds like a mix of dubstep and screamo? Can somebody help me find more music like that/what kind it really is? And tell me if you like it to... NOT THE SCREAMOOOOOOOOOOO

item.title: Help me identify the music
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Haven’t heard it yet, haven’t watched it yet, I’ll edit in like half an hour when it’s loaded, but dubstep/bassy stuff mixed with screamo sounds a lot like Enter Shikari kinda thing?

Though, listening to it, it sounds more like Bring Me The Horizon or A Day To Remember.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me identify the music
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:5, topic:364472”]A Day to Remember, Senses Fail, etc… Although ADTR has a lot of screaming. I guess some Coheed and Cambria, but it depends how far you’re willing to push.[/quote]the chorus part? i know all of those except cambria and they’re know what im looking for

Read full topic

…

item.title: Help me identify the music
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

A Day to Remember, Senses Fail, etc… Although ADTR has a lot of screaming. I guess some Coheed and Cambria, but it depends how far you’re willing to push.

item.title: Help me identify the music

item.description:

Wouldn’t this belong in General Questions…?
[/quote]kinda. i also asked if u guys liked it too so its half and half…

and either way it really doesn’t matter. its not like im posting this in tutorials or shit… so quit bitching about if shits in the right section <3[/quote]

I never “bitched”. I was just saying but

@Topic: I’ve never heard of this style of music…
